title: Marward Sweets Pilani branding, Instagram contact, and owner catalog management UI

requirements.summary: Replace all visible shop branding text with "Marward Sweets Pilani" across the app header, footer, and landing content.
acceptanceCriteria: Header brand text shows "Marward Sweets Pilani".
Footer brand text and copyright line use "Marward Sweets Pilani".
No user-facing text displays "Rajasthan Sweets" as the shop name anywhere in the app.

file_operations.description: Update visible header/footer brand text and footer copyright to "Marward Sweets Pilani"; ensure no remaining user-facing occurrences of "Rajasthan Sweets".
Update landing/home hero and related user-facing copy that implies the generic shop name so branding aligns with "Marward Sweets Pilani" while keeping English UI text.

requirements.summary: Show and link the shop Instagram handle "@marward_sweets_pilani" to the correct Instagram URL with safe new-tab behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer Instagram icon/link navigates to https://instagram.com/marward_sweets_pilani.
Instagram link opens in a new tab and includes rel="noopener noreferrer".
The Instagram handle is shown somewhere in the UI as "@marward_sweets_pilani" (English UI text).

file_operations.description: Replace the placeholder Instagram footer link (currently "#") with https://instagram.com/marward_sweets_pilani, open in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer", and display the handle as "@marward_sweets_pilani" in English. (If using shadcn-ui components for layout/typography, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

requirements.summary: Add an owner-only UI (gated by Internet Identity sign-in and admin/owner role) to add sweets and update sweet prices, and refresh catalog data after successful changes.
acceptanceCriteria: There is a clear navigation entry (or button) to reach an "Owner"/"Manage Catalog" screen.
The owner screen requires Internet Identity sign-in; unauthenticated users are prompted to sign in.
The owner screen prevents non-owners from performing add/update actions and shows an English error message if attempted.
After adding a sweet, it appears in the Catalog page without a hard refresh (React Query invalidation/refetch is triggered).
After updating a price, the updated price appears in Catalog and Sweet Details views without a hard refresh.

file_operations.description: Create an "Owner / Manage Catalog" screen with: (1) Internet Identity sign-in prompt when unauthenticated, (2) admin/owner-only guard using the authorization role checks, (3) form to add a sweet (name, description, category, price, image path), and (4) controls to update price for an existing sweet. Use React Query mutations that invalidate/refetch the sweets query on success and show English success/error messages. Use shadcn-ui form/layout primitives (e.g., Button/Input/Select/Card) by composition only; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add React Query hooks/mutations needed by the Owner screen: caller role/admin query (for owner gating), add-sweet mutation, and update-price mutation; ensure onSuccess invalidates the existing ['sweets'] query so Catalog and Sweet Details refresh without a hard reload. (This relies on the authorization system and the existing actor wiring; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
Wire the new owner management screen into app navigation by extending the Page union/state and rendering OwnerCatalogPage when selected; ensure navigation scroll behavior remains consistent.

Add a clear navigation entry/button for "Owner" / "Manage Catalog" in both desktop and mobile navigation that routes to the Owner screen. Keep the Owner screen itself responsible for sign-in prompting and non-owner access messaging. (If using shadcn-ui Button or other UI components, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
